PropertyComment.summary: The list of statements contained within this block.

TypeComment.summary: The base type for parameter nodes.
Represents a function declaration's parameter list.
The base class for table fields.
Represents a table field whose key is an identifier.
Represents a table field whose key is an expression.
Represents a table field without a key.
The base class for function name nodes.
Represents a function name which is only an identifier.
Represents a function name which is a member.
Represents a method-style function name syntax.

PropertyComment.summary: The base name for this method.

TypeComment.summary: The base class for function arguments.
Represents a string being passed as a function call's argument.

PropertyComment.summary: The string literal being passed as an argument.

TypeComment.summary: Represents a table being passed as a function call's arguments.
Represents a list of expressions being passed as a function's arguments.

PropertyComment.summary: The argument list's opening parenthesis token.
The argument list's closing parenthesis token.

TypeComment.summary: The base class for variable expressions (values that can be assigned to).

PropertyComment.summary: The expression that contains the member being accessed.
The dot separating the expression and the identifier.
The identifier representing the member name.
The expression that contains the member being accessed.
The expression on the left side of the operator.
The expression on the right side of the operator.

TypeComment.summary: Represents an elseif clause in an if expression.

PropertyComment.summary: The value to be returned if the condition is true.
The value that will be returned if condition is true.
The value that will be returned if none of the previous conditions are true.

TypeComment.summary: The base node for prefix expressions (expressions that can be called as functions, have methods called on them and/or have members/elements accessed on them).

PropertyComment.summary: The expression returning the function to be called.

TypeComment.summary: Represents a method call (obj:method args...) expression.

PropertyComment.summary: The expression that contains the method being called.
The identifier containing the method name.
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).

TypeComment.summary: Represents a variable name in a node.
Represents the values being assigned to the names in an assignment or variable declaration.

PropertyComment.summary: The list of values being assigned.
The values being assigned to the names (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The expression on the right side of the operator.
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).

TypeComment.summary: Represents a local variable declaration statement.

PropertyComment.summary: The list of names being assigned to.
The values being assigned to the names (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The expression defining the initial value of the loop variable.
The comma separating the initial value from the final value.
The expression defining the final value of the loop variable.
The comma separating the final value from the step value. May be None if there is no step.
The expression defining the step value of the loop variable. May be None if there is no step.
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).

TypeComment.summary: Represents a generic for loop statement.

PropertyComment.summary: The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The name of the label being jumped to.
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).

TypeComment.summary: Represents a local function declaration statement.

PropertyComment.summary: The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The delimiter on the left of the name.
The delimiter on the right of the name.
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).
The semicolon at the end of the statement (if any).

TypeComment.summary: The base node for type annotations
The node representing a type annotation

PropertyComment.summary: The colon at the start of the statement (if any).
The type of the statement (if any).
The type of the statement (if any).
The question mark at the start of the statement (if any).

Node.TypeComment: A Represents a tuple type binding

PropertyComment.summary: The colon at the start of the statement (if any).
The expression on the left side of the operator.
The colon colon at the middle of the operator.
The type on the right side of the operator.
The type on the left side of the operator.
The pipe at the middle of the operator.
The type on the right side of the operator.
The type on the left side of the operator.
The pipe at the middle of the operator.
The type on the right side of the operator.
The parenthesis at the beginning of the operator.
The parenthesis at the beginning of the operator.

TypeComment.summary: The node containing all of the file's contents.

PropertyComment.summary: The statements in the compilation unit.
